name: Treasure Finder (Bogdan Cenusa)
description:
As an adventurer, your mission is to find the golden statue of a great hero
in the dungeon. But beware of tricky puzzles and obstacles that stand in your
way. Use your W, A, S, D keys to move and left-click to interact with objects.
Once you find the statue, bring it back to the respawn point so you can open the cell and get out.
Can you complete the quest and retrieve the golden statue?
